mapper.select: SELECT article.*,a.name as game_name,user.user_name,c.type_name FROM article INNER JOIN (SELECT id,name FROM game) a ON article.game_id=a.id INNER JOIN (SELECT id,name as user_name FROM user) user on article.user_id = user.id inner JOIN (SELECT id,type_name FROM article_type) c ON article.article_type_id = c.id WHERE article.title like #{title} order by article.update_time Desc;
